_notes: Each unit has 'lines': an array of strings
weights: emotional state multipliers (curious, analytical, amused, concerned, contemplative, excited, bored, surprised)
- Only specify emotions that deviate from 1.0 default
- Higher weight = more likely when in that emotional state
themes: semantic tags for additional granularity
